website_summaries.verdict: A popular and attractive choice in Edison type bulbs that has a few issues with quality control.
pros: Many users give positive comments about the attractive appearance and bright yet warm light
We love that they are designed to be long-lasting
cons: Some consumers reported that the bulbs burned too hot, and a few experienced bulbs breaking when in use, so quality control could be improved

customer_reviews.title: Multiple friends have commented they like the look
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom had those ugly white globe lights set into a long silver bar. I'm in an apartment, so I can't just rip out fixtures and put up new ones. However, I can change the type of bulb. I put these bulbs in the strip, and my bathroom looks a tad more modern. Multiple friends have commented they like the look. They're also just as bright as the globe lights. I'm extremely please with how these bulbs look.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Coenen

customer_reviews.title: Very good.  NIce warm light.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. They are typical sized light bulbs so they screw right in. The light is much nicer. These pictures are a before and after. Quite the difference.
customer_reviews.author: K. C.

customer_reviews.title: Moderate quality bulbs
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs are exactly what I ordered, however one of them was unusable because the threads of the bulbs were mashed during manufacturing. If all of them had been of good quality, I probably would have given 5 stars. No idea on the bulb life yet.
customer_reviews.author: Molly L Bristol

customer_reviews.title: Great warm light!
customer_reviews.text: We wired 3 Sekond cord kits ([...]) together in a light box, added the light cages ( and Edison bulbs. The lights were a great looking and economical way to add light to our vaulted ceilings. Great warm light!
customer_reviews.author: JenniferTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because they were advertised along with an industrial light fixture I was ordered for a small powder room. I liked the idea of these exposed bulbs and thought I would give them a try. They look so good with the light fixture. I can't comment on how long they last yet because I haven't been using for very long. I am pleased with the light quality and look of them at this point. If interested, this is the light fixture I ordered to go with them: Linea di Liara Andante Industrial Factory Semi Flushmount Ceiling Lamp - Polished Chrome One-Light Fixture with Metal Shade Exposed Hardware - 5-Inch Canopy - Downlight Modern Vintage LL-C407-PC
customer_reviews.author: K. Self

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect Edison bulbs!! Tried all the box stores but these win out by a landslide for price and appearance!!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased Edison bulbs from the big box stores as well as online retailers but haven't liked any as much as I like these. The color is perfect and the look is pure vintage! I have several fixtures in my home that feature these bulbs and they perform perfectly. I've reordered more each time I purchase a new fixture because I know they're consistent. Also, you can't beat this price! Great seller, too!!
customer_reviews.author: hippie@heart

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are so authentic looking! They just 'make' a light/lamp look the age I was looking for! All of the bulbs came in it's own package and them in a larger box for safety of the bulbs, NO breakage of any of them! All of the bulbs work! I also love the fact that they are on today's energy saving standards. Will be buying more!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Creates Fresh Look
customer_reviews.text: We bought these bulbs for 2 new Urban rustic light fixtures we have. They go perfectly with the Decour and I really sharp looking. They are much brighter than we thought they would be, which is nice because we thought our foyer was going to be slightly more dim with the new look. Almost a natural lighting. These bulbs give a fresh look to our interior I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennyfromtheblock

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a lot of Edison-style bulbs from Amazon in recent years with varying results. But these are by far the best I've found. I only wish I'd found them two years ago. I, like others, worried about the brightness. But after installing them above my bathroom vanity (where I want fairly bright light). I'm very, very happy with them. They look great and provide the amount of light they're supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Christina W

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of Light
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of Edison bulbs in the 5 industrial lights we have in our kitchen. It's a warm light (which I prefer) and works just fine on a dimmer. 60w is quite bright, so nice to be able to knock it down a notch.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Larose

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but died fast!
customer_reviews.text: These look very pretty in my new light fixtures and they're nice and bright for my kitchen, but one burnt out after only two months... Another just turned black on the inside and a third (the one on the left in the picture with the lights off) is starting to look dark too! Although the glass is burnt looking, they still work, but I just took the really black one out because I'm paranoid about it starting on fire or something. Do all Edison style bulbs burn out that fast, and turn black?? I'm not sure, but I'm going to find different ones to replace these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lighting
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was nervous about how an LED could possible pull off the look of an Edison style bulb. Bought these to go into 3 pendant lighting fixtures in kitchen along with dimmers. Installation was as easy as changing the bulb and the product performed amazing. It really adds another level of lighting to the kitchen. The dimmer will allow it to just barely illuminate the "squirrel cage" and showcase you fixtures. Cannot beat them for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Smillers

customer_reviews.title: Going back in time to the begining of electric lights!
customer_reviews.text: Well packed for shipping. The bulbs definitely give off an old time glow and seem to stand up to being dimmed. Make sure to read the directions on the box. You do need to be careful with these, as the filaments are fragile - write up specifically notes to not turn the light that you use them in on and off multiple times in a row (shock to the bulb will, no doubt, break the filaments). The "special" price definitely made the purchase worth while.
customer_reviews.author: William Edward Cutlip

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: They get super hot. didn't want to take my chances of burning down my house. didn't use them and way to bright anyways. they are not "a warm glow" more like an annoying bright light in your face. can't use them without a shade of some sort (fireproof) which defeats the purpose of the Edison look.
customer_reviews.author: BiteThatSukka

customer_reviews.title: Too hot to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought an antique stone lamp made in the1920's and wanted a Edison style bulb to go with it. I put in a bulb and noticed the extreme heat almost immediately. After 15 minutes I shut it off and discovered the stone lamp itself was very very hot to the touch. Too hot. I'm afraid of damaging my lamp or starting a fire. Using this bulb would melt a plastic shade in minutes. I don't have any fixtures that can handle this kind of heat.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price!! I did a price check at Lowes and Walmart and for one bulb it was priced at $9.00!! I got six for $20.00 can't beat the price. The bulb is pretty bright, recent reviews stated they weren't but they turned out to be better than what I had before!
customer_reviews.author: Rox

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs work great but i ordered 2 sets and the bulbs were ...
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs work great but i ordered 2 sets and the bulbs were different in each bulb. The fixture I ordered it for requires 8 bulbs.... the 2 from the second package out of a obvious different light and the actual filament inside looked completely different.
customer_reviews.author: yessikavilla

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for good lighting (like a regular light bulb) with an interesting ...
customer_reviews.text: Bulb is too bright and not what I expected. If you’re looking for good lighting (like a regular light bulb) with an interesting shaped bulb, this is a good product for you. If you’re looking for dim, truly vintage lighting for aesthetic purposes (like I am), then this is not for you. Unless you have a dimmer and plan to adjust the bulb to your needs, the bulb will light up the same amount of brightness as most regular bulbs. I could only see the filaments when turning it off :(
customer_reviews.author: Josh A.

customer_reviews.title: look great, terrific price, well packaged and quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: oh, these are so cook! they make the bronze 'pipe-like' pendent light fixture we have look really great in our farmhouse family room. we dim the light in the evening and they're so pretty - great price too! i'll be buying more as we go through the house replacing our current, blah fixtures for fixtures more suited to our old farmhouse.
customer_reviews.author: TomTom

customer_reviews.title: It does provide good light for our installation in the kitchen and dinning ...
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are 60w but the color of the light is an amber colored light. It does provide good light for our installation in the kitchen and dinning room, we installed 4 fixtures. Together, all 4 provided sufficient light. The bulbs are a lot more decorative than an average light bulb.
customer_reviews.author: nmart

customer_reviews.title: My home looks different now
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to change from LED to Incandescent Light because of health benefits. I changed all the lights to this Incandescent Light. Initially my kid and wife said that the room is dull. But after few days we got used to it. Not only that, our home is now more calm (not dull). Now evening gives us proper evening feel as it supposed to be. Glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SimpleShop

customer_reviews.title: I added a dimmer switch to lessen the glare so now I can have good light for cooking or dim down for atmosphere
customer_reviews.text: Bright light that is very white. Almost too bright for my kitchen island area. . I added a dimmer switch to lessen the glare so now I can have good light for cooking or dim down for atmosphere.
customer_reviews.author: J in PA

customer_reviews.title: Love the soft light!
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our kitchen's fluorescent light (yuck) with an industrial lam with these bulbs. WOW! These bulbs completely changed the space. It lit up the dark corner in our kitchen and made everything look softer. I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: EarthShine

customer_reviews.title: Here’s a bright idea! Buy this & be happy!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are amazing and are priced amazing! I had purchased an Edison bulb from Walmart and only had it for a few weeks and it already went bad, so far these are surpassing the Walmart in quality and price! I will be back for more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pintrist lighting projects.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs have worked very well so far. Saw a diy chandelier on pintrist that used these style of bulbs. They can be quite costly then I saw them on a lightning deal. They arrived in perfect condition and look great lit up.
customer_reviews.author: Josh K.

customer_reviews.title: Dim Old Edison Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs did not shine as brightly as we thought they would. My husband was placing them in the greenhouse because the bulbs matched his vintage decor, but he was disappointed in the light the bulbs put out. Cool, vintage look, but not very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Martin

customer_reviews.title: you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bulbs to use with Truelite Industrial Vintage Mini 2 light metal sconces, and 2 1930's refurbished cast iron light fixture. The metal sconces have been installed, these bulbs give incredible amount of light, and add incredible beauty and uniqueness. If you decide to make this purchase, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ldavis

customer_reviews.title: Love the light...
customer_reviews.text: Super price and good quality. This is so pretty in our bedroom. They are bright enough for a reading bulb but they have such a pretty soft golden glow. They look great in a glass shade, as the light in itself is so attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great bulb, great look
customer_reviews.text: I build weird lamps and these bulbs make them look extra special. They look great and last a long time. While I haven't had a problem with these bulbs, most of these break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Stansbury

customer_reviews.title: Bright and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: These are really bright and look great, they provide enough light for my living room, dining room and kitchen from one central fixture using 3 bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Dundas

customer_reviews.title: great dimming bulb
customer_reviews.text: great dimming bulb. Gives warm yellow light when dimmed. We use in dinning room. Bright enough to light up the entire room if needed, and nice warm yellow light when dimmed for a romantic dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs all worked great and were in pretty fair condition. My only complaint is that the glass on the bulbs were a little dirty/smudged, but it is nothing too noticeable. I would recommend getting some sort of dimmer to give the bulbs a really warm, low light look.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: These bulbs are much brighter than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are brighter than I expected. They look really good. They are also packed well. Amazon had placed these in the same box as my 40 lbs of dog food and they did not break.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: If you have an old house... You should try these!
customer_reviews.text: They look awesome on my 100 year old house! Just screwed these into my porch light fixture without any shade and, Voila! Period correct lighting!
customer_reviews.author: tommylee

customer_reviews.title: Not LED
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are beautiful, but I just realized that they are not LED. There are many options on Amazon for energy saver Edison bulbs and I will buy those next time.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: They do what we bought them to do. We have had them for about a year and they all still work.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Sweat

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: With the lamp fixture I bought the lights were great. They do get hot too, be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lights! Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and worth every cent! They made such a difference in my place. They DO give off a ton of heat so be wary of that and they are much bigger than I anticipated (but that was a pleasant surprise to me not a bad one) Good lighting can make such a difference to a room so again, these were definitely a rewarding purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Kreitzer

customer_reviews.title: These are super bright. Much brighter than my other 60W edison ...
customer_reviews.text: These are super bright. Much brighter than my other 60W edison bulbs. Overall a great product, although out of the 18 I ordered 2 came burned out and wouldn't work in my new light fixture!
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful Ruin

customer_reviews.title: Works in all lights beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome in my fan lights! They're so pretty ! They look so antique!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Just as I  hoped
customer_reviews.text: These are fun bright bulbs. Live in the mountains, and while they fit my decor perfectly , they provide a lot of light.
customer_reviews.author: LynG

customer_reviews.title: 2 Days - 1 down
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 packs of these. Look is exactly what I was wanting but put them in just 2 days ago and one has already gone out on us. So sad because I REALLY love these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs turn gray/black
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs turned black after 6 months. Look horrible. Buy from different vendor.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These finished off the look of our new modern light for our dining room! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If they don’t all work you’re screwed
customer_reviews.text: The bulbs are nice. However, I bought 18 of them and of course the last one did not work. I tried to contact Amazon and they said they cannot help me. So I need to buy a six pack of lightbulbs just for one bad bulb?? That’s the only thing that’s really bothering me.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Honestly you cannot beat the price we've checked with home depot, lowes and Walmart and you cannot beat the price and they look great
customer_reviews.author: Rantti Hediscus

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs turn black
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months the bulbs turned black on a few of them. They still light up but it looks so ugly during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Zen

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for these bulbs. I highly recommend. Gorgeous lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Renea Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bulb, I prefer the look of these over ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bulb, I prefer the look of these over the LED Edison bulbs. The LED Edison bulbs I have purchased had more of a yellow look to them which I did not care for.
customer_reviews.author: C. Henn

customer_reviews.title: Love the way the bulb looks in the fixture
customer_reviews.text: Love the way the bulb looks in the fixture. Disappointed that the first bulb I used popped and failed. They are a bit too pricey for me to take a chance on ordering anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Gives off really nice warm light
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Gives off really nice warm light. One bulb did arrive with the filament broken inside the bulb, but I didn't notice for a while since I only needed a couple at first. But overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Kring

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and light enough for me
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful. WE have them in an industrial like lighting fixture above our dining room. We've had them for about 2 months or so and they look really pretty. I think they are bright enough but we do have 3 in the fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Look
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product few times now. Good modern look and sleek design.
customer_reviews.author: Claud

customer_reviews.title: Very pleSed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to go in my new rustic lantern type lights. They look great off but once lit they shine such pure light and are so pretty. I also shopped the “best price” for this style and this pack was the best value
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I'd purchased them again.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to go in Tiffany style lamps and they do look great! A little pricy but it does enhance the look of the hanging light fixtures in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Voss

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and bright
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of Edison bulbs but was surprised about how much light they generated!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: I will not purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: Had these bulbs for 2 weeks and already a bulb is out. Dont have much confidence that tje others won't also go out soon. Awesome price but may turn out to be a raw deal.😔
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Barnes

customer_reviews.title: So far they are lasting pretty well though
customer_reviews.text: I am very much liking these. I did take a star away because 2 of them blew out the first time I turned them on. So far they are lasting pretty well though.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Postma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful warm but bright bulbs. Use them for my outside lighting. Retro look is simply cool.Just received them so we'll see how long they burn.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Great condition upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Great condition upon arrival !! Lights are yellowish and medium brightness. Perfect for the basement bedroom that has a large east facing window. Hope you love them as much as we do
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great lights!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these lights. They give off a lot of light and are perfect on a dimmer!
customer_reviews.author: Mrna

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully priced bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: We love our bulbs, they dim nicely although I like them turned all the way up. They are great quality and pricing. We will continue to keep purchasing these as long they hold up!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lights are great! Was sad to only get three out of the 6.. 3 broke in shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Miss K

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs look amazing and a very bright. Unfortunately we do not turn the light fixture on because it is so bright
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for a golden glow, then this ...
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a golden glow, then this bulb is the one; however, if you’re looking for brighter light look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Country home!
customer_reviews.text: They give off a very nice amber glow second time I have ordered these bulbs they are NICE
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Change for Old Fixture
customer_reviews.text: Revived my old "Hollywood" style lights around a vanity mirror with these bulbs. Looks great. I got the 60 watt and they run a bit bright/hot, but I have a dimmer in there, so it's ok. I would order 40 watt next time. Packaged well, no broken bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Duchess of Oakmoor

customer_reviews.title: I liked the bulbs and I am happy with the other ...
customer_reviews.text: one of the 6 bulbs was broken in the box. I contacted the seller but did not receive a reply. Still, I liked the bulbs and I am happy with the other 5.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs look amazing and were a great value compared to what the stores are selling them for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these light bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Love these light bulbs. We had one that went out the 2nd day. I ask for a refund on the one lightbulb, but haven't heard back from anyone yet. Other than that they look great in our rustic bathroom lights.
customer_reviews.author: PJG

customer_reviews.title: Great price!!!!  Love these
customer_reviews.text: I will buy these again when I need them. Less expensive than Home Depot or Lowe's, sorry for that guys, but if I can find the same product online and it's basically the same thing, I'll do it every time. I love these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: Like look of bulbs. Bulbs bright. My only complaint is 1 of the 6 bulbs was completely shattered when package arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Celestina Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great price... and CLEAR glass. Many of the Edison bulbs have an amber tint which I was trying to avoid. These are stunning in the right lighting fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Fit standard/regular fixtures and are dimmable. Love them, super cool
customer_reviews.author: Doc Inman

customer_reviews.title: Watch voltage
customer_reviews.text: These are shown with a fan that they can’t be used in - too much voltage!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of light!
customer_reviews.text: These look great with our vintage looking ceiling light. Give out plenty of light. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Cindyluwho

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights and packed well
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking Edison lights, arrived in good shape. Price was good compared to buying one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: 6 STARS - clear w/ white light!
customer_reviews.text: These are clear and put off white light like a regular incandescent bulb. SOO much better than the amber colored bulbs that came with our light. Replacement bulbs at Lowes and Home Depot were all amber and very expensive. Buying more for spares before they're gone.
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: My house has a very olde timey look to it ...
customer_reviews.text: My house has a very olde timey look to it and was built in 1884. I've recently added some antique track lighting and these bulbs complete the olde look.
customer_reviews.author: Birchbarkcanoe

customer_reviews.title: Two Defective Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately two of the bulbs were broken upon arrival and one burned out within a month of installation in a fixture that is rarely used. I would not recommend buying them. Giving two stars because the bulbs that do work look nice.
customer_reviews.author: jason hershey

customer_reviews.title: The bulbs are very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love these bulbs. They emit a very soft light, which is easy on the eyes without sacrificing the ability to see. We use these bulbs in the light above our dining table and really love the look.
customer_reviews.author: LabLover

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: 3 out of 4 bulbs where broken, well smashed. I sent them back. I will buy my bulbs locally.
customer_reviews.author: BethAnn

customer_reviews.title: Good looking light bulbs, great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bulbs to put in three lantern lights I hung over my kitchen island. The lights with these bulbs in them have completely change the look of my kitchen for the better. I previously paid twice this much for these bulbs at Lowe's.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Warm color bulb
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs make a retro fixture look even more authentic. Warm color, not the bright white of traditional bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Shagrat

customer_reviews.title: Great light bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool light bulbs and they look really good in a recent light fixture we bought. Sadly the light fixture is cheap & flimsy but the lights are great.
customer_reviews.author: Cory&Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Looks great burns very hot
customer_reviews.text: Looks great burns very hot . My husband joked that we will use only in winter time . Too hot to keep on for longer than 15 mins .
customer_reviews.author: samantha amy stone

customer_reviews.title: I love it! The glass is clear
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The glass is clear, it gives a lot of light, and it looks pretty on my table lamp. I got 6 light bulbs for the price of one at Home Depot or Target, and definitely they look more beautiful compare to those sold at the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Lissett

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy Lightbulbs
customer_reviews.text: These light bulbs look amazing! This was the first time I have ever purchased Edison bulbs and wow what a great look in a light fixture. I purchased them to go in the Ecopower Industrial Edison Vintage Style 1-Light Pendant Glass Hanging Light that I purchased for my kitchen and could not be happier with both purchases. I now ordered the candelabra Edison bulbs for my other light fixture because I like the look so much.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great Old Time look!
customer_reviews.text: I bought six Globe Electric Vintage lights. These bulbs were a good fit and look. So far no problems at all. Has an old time subdued brightness. I'm using them outside in the garage, perfect spot. Really makes the place special...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle customer Draw4th

customer_reviews.title: yellow light
customer_reviews.text: These came on top and in perfect condition. I didn't realize how yellow their tint would be but that's my problem because I've never used Edison bulbs before.
customer_reviews.author: CindyAmazonReview

customer_reviews.title: Color of light is cool white.
customer_reviews.text: These are cool white, not amber, great price compared to local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: cburgkid

customer_reviews.title: Broken bulb
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these twice. The first one was perfect but the second one was not. Out of 6 bulbs one did not work. Not pleased about this because I don't want to return all bulbs just for one.
customer_reviews.author: bob cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Good bit run hot
customer_reviews.text: These are HOT. In a small bathroom we run three and they heat the whole bathroom up. We are going to switch them to LED
customer_reviews.author: A. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: old fashion looking bulbs
customer_reviews.text: these light bulbs go great with the John Deer pulley light fixture! Don't forget to use them where you can actually see the bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Joan V. Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Glass blackens with minimal use
customer_reviews.text: These are nice but they don’t last. They blacken with limited use. Will not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Peters

customer_reviews.title: Hot bulbs
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are HOT! Look great in the new kitchen!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Jr

customer_reviews.title: Really nice look!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bulbs! The only drawback is that they seem to run hot. That wouldn't be a problem for someone with a large kitchen, but mine is small. Other than that they give off a great light!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs are fine though.
customer_reviews.text: Multiple bulbs in pack - bulb sizes vary widely so if used in a row of lights there will/may be different sizes that you can recognize visually. Bulbs are fine though.
customer_reviews.author: dwade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and work perfectly in my bathroom. Great lighting. Just a note: they put off some heat.
customer_reviews.author: pucklizard

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs are exactly as I wanted and expected. I had a very hard time finding clear bulbs and so glad I found them and at a reasonable price for these type bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

product_meta.title: NALAKUVARA Edison Light Bulb, Antique Style Amber Warm Light, Clear Glass Squirrel Cage Incandescent Lights, E26/E27 Base Dimmable (60w/110v), 6-Pack
product_meta.description:
The shaped glass is exactly like a traditional Edison Teardrop shape and fits regular light fittings with good representation of colors

Made of glass,these old style vintage light bulbs adds a warm glow to any vintage, contemporary or steampunk decor.

The bulb is fantastic for atmospheric lighting,in a multi-bulb pendant light. Great suit for chandeliers,wall sconces,and pendant lighting,and for home decoration

Packaging including:
